summary: This bill, the "Molly R. Loomis Research for Descendants of Toxic Exposed Veterans Act of 2025," mandates the Interagency Working Group on Toxic Exposure to conduct research on the diagnosis and treatment of health conditions in descendants of veterans exposed to toxic substances. It amends the 2022 "Promise to Address Comprehensive Toxics Act" to establish task forces for collaborative research, requiring reports on research activities, findings, and recommendations for improvement. The bill also directs the Working Group and the Agency for Toxic Substances and Disease Registry to establish an interagency task force for research on descendants and maintain a public website with information.
